page.title: 06Barton Village Sports
page.content:
The village sports day takes place early in June of each year on the field next to the Village Hall, which is on the northern edge of the area, where the main road crosses the railway line.
This year the afternoon began with the crowning of the Rose Queen from St Lawrence's Church and the Sport's Queen from St Mary's School by the wives of the headmasters of the two schools. This was followed by a performance of country and disco dancing by children from both schools.
There were various races for the children during the afternoon before tea in the Village Hall. There was also a fancy dress competition.
In the evening a family disco dance was held in the Village Hall.
